name: Sphere Block Craft: Online Build World Craft Game
name_original: Sphere Block Craft: Online Build World Craft Game
description:
Sphere Block Craft is a pixel sandbox game where you can build anything you can image!

#Lovely mobs, monsters! Weather etc.
#Multiplayer!
#Creative/Survival mode

Many more features will be added, please give us good rate to support the update.

Note: This is not an official Mojang app. We are not associated or connected with Mojang AB. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with the creator of this game or its licensers.
